✓ One Fixed Price ✓ No Upfront Payments  ✓ Gas Safe Approved ✓ 10 Year Warranty on Boilers ✓ Next Day installation ✓ No-Sub Contractors ✓ Price Match Guarantee

Boiler Playing Up?

Get A New Boiler Installed within 24-48 Hrs
with Covid Safe Installation

No Site Visit Needed Our intelligent
System will work it out for you.
Getting your out from freezing to heating in just 24 hrs & all that at fixed and fair price without any salespeople involved. This is how we do it.

ANSWER FEW SIMPLE QUESTIONS

Online Smart Finance.
Coming Soon

Soon we’ll be offering online smart finance.
Until then for any finance-related queries,
Call our finance team on

0300 303 0902

or

Email at  finance@gasheatinginstallers.co.uk

Comparing Prices?

Our Boilers Fit Every Budget


We are confident that our offers fit every budget. But still, if you have a better offer Lets save your time, we will match or beat any like for like quote by £50 or by offering better material or services on our product.

Planning to Replace your Radiators too?

Hold on to your hats! We can even arrange Radiator up-gradation during your new boiler installation. We fit all types of designer or standard radiators on new or existing locations with unbeatable prices

Seeing is Believing

Don't just take our word for it..

We believe in our engineers and their flawless top-quality workmanship, So there is nothing to hide. They deliver what we promise, completing all type of installations hassle and mess free and all that within a day.

We Protect Your New Boiler Too..

We have partnered with the most reliable brands in the market. As responsible engineers we fit best heating controls & protect the new boiler with best chemicals & system filters to keep your new system healthy and running great for many years.
~ Preview ~
~ Preview ~
~ Preview ~

Great News

Our Engineers have been vaccinated & are all set to carry out a safe installation in your home. We didn’t compromise your safety in the past and neither we intend to do it now, so they’ll wear the necessary PPE Kit, keep appropriate distance while having any conversation and ensures the area they use is disinfected before leaving.
